template.title: JavaScript基礎演習
template.description: 初心者向けJavaScriptプログラミング基礎コース。15週の実践的な課題を通じて、JavaScriptの基本からDOM操作、非同期処理、外部API連携まで段階的に学習します。

JavaScript基礎演習.title: JavaScript Basic Course
JavaScript基礎演習.description: Beginner-friendly JavaScript programming fundamentals course. Learn step by step from JavaScript basics to DOM manipulation, asynchronous processing, and external API integration through 15 weeks of practical exercises.

JavaScript基礎.title: JavaScript Basics
JavaScript基礎.description: JavaScript basic syntax, conditionals, arrays, loops, functions

DOM操作.title: DOM Manipulation
DOM操作.description: Getting and manipulating DOM elements, event handling, creating, adding, and deleting elements
deliverables: Can get and manipulate DOM elements
Can dynamically create, add, and delete elements

中間評価と復習.title: Mid-term Evaluation and Review
中間評価と復習.description: Comprehensive review and mid-term evaluation of weeks 1-7

データ管理と非同期処理.title: Data Management and Asynchronous Processing
データ管理と非同期処理.description: WebStorage, JSON, asynchronous processing, external API integration

総合課題.title: Comprehensive Project
総合課題.description: Comprehensive web application development utilizing previous learning
deliverables: Integration and practice of learned content

第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.title: Week 1: JavaScript Basics and Conditionals
第1週：JavaScriptの基礎・条件分岐.description: JavaScript basic syntax, variables, data types, operators, if statements, switch statements

第2週：配列・ループ・関数.title: Week 2: Arrays, Loops, and Functions
第2週：配列・ループ・関数.description: Arrays, loops (for, while, forEach), function definition and calls

第3週：DOM.title: Week 3: DOM
第3週：DOM.description: DOM (Document Object Model) basics, getting and manipulating elements

第4週：イベント処理.title: Week 4: Event Handling
第4週：イベント処理.description: Event listeners, click events, input events, keyboard events

第5週：ループとイベント.title: Week 5: Loops and Events
第5週：ループとイベント.description: Combining loops with event handling, practical exercises

第6週：Elementの作成・追加.title: Week 6: Creating and Adding Elements
第6週：Elementの作成・追加.description: Creating DOM elements dynamically, adding elements to the page

第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.title: Week 7: Deleting Elements and Adding Events to Dynamic Elements
第7週：Elementの削除・動的なElementへのイベント追加.description: Removing elements, event delegation, adding events to dynamically created elements

第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.title: Week 8: Reserve Day (Mid-term Evaluation Week)
第8週：予備日（中間評価週）.description: Comprehensive review and mid-term assignment for weeks 1-7

第9週：WebStorageの利用.title: Week 9: Using WebStorage
第9週：WebStorageの利用.description: Data persistence using localStorage and sessionStorage

第10週：JSONについて.title: Week 10: About JSON
第10週：JSONについて.description: JSON format, parsing and stringifying JSON data

第11週：非同期処理・タイマー関数.title: Week 11: Asynchronous Processing and Timer Functions

第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.title: Week 12: External APIs and Asynchronous Communication
第12週：外部APIと非同期通信.description: Fetch API, making HTTP requests, handling API responses
